# See https://github.com/check-spelling/check-spelling/wiki/Configuration-Examples:-excludes

(?:^|/)(?i)LICEN[CS]E
(?:^|/)3rdparty/
(?:^|/)go\.sum$
(?:^|/)package(?:-lock|)\.json$
(?:^|/)Pipfile$
(?:^|/)pyproject.toml
(?:^|/)requirements(?:-dev|-doc|-test|)\.txt$
(?:^|/)vendor/

\.lib$
\.lock$
\.map$

\.mo$

\.o$
\.ocf$

^\.github/actions/spelling/
^\Q.github/workflows/spelling.yml\E$
^\Qsrc/site/resources/profile.jacoco\E$
^\Qsrc/test/resources/org/apache/commons/io/CharSequenceReader.bin\E$
^\Qsrc/test/resources/org/apache/commons/io/dirs-1-file-size-0/file-size-0.bin\E$
^\Qsrc/test/resources/org/apache/commons/io/dirs-1-file-size-1/file-size-1.bin\E$

^src/test/resources/org/apache/commons/io/dirs-2-file-size-2/
